oai_dc:dc.dc:title: French. National Women's Party letter, March 22, 1923.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Martha Souder, Headquarters Secretary, National Women's Party, Washington, D.C., to Mrs. L. Crozier French, 620 W. Cumberland Avenue, Knoxville, TN. Activity appreciated with equal rights bill, Mrs. Ritzen's work in Nashville. 1 p. March 22, 1923. Lizzie Crozier French Papers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Women's rights; Correspondence; Organizations;
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Martha Souder, National Women's Party
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
